intro: Euphrasia × minniae, commonly known as the hybrid eyebright, is a perennial herb native to Europe and parts of Asia. It belongs to the family Scrophulariaceae and is characterized by its small, showy flowers that range in color from yellow to orange. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and meadows. It has hairy stems and lance-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine, downy hairs. Euphrasia × minniae is valued in herbal medicine for its potential health benefits, though its exact medicinal properties remain under study.
